text: Willy Borsus (born 4 April 1962 in Ciney) is a Belgian politician of the Mouvement r√©formateur. He is the current Minister-President of Wallonia. Borsus was both a councillor and mayor of the Somme-Leuze municipality, a councillor of the Namur Province, a member of the Parliament of Wallonia and the Parliament of the French Community, and also a government minister in the Michel Government. He has been Minister-President of the Walloon Government since July 28, 2017, succeeding Paul Magnette. == References == * www.rtbf.be == Other websites == * Homepage Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian mayors Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:Reformist Movement politicians Category:People from Namur (province) Category:Walloon politicians
title: Willy Borsus
